class jv
{
	public static void main(String[] r)
	{
		java.util.Scanner sc=new java.util.Scanner(System.in);
		
		int t=sc.nextInt(),n,i;
		
		while(t-->0)
		{
			n=sc.nextInt();
			
			int[] a=new int[n];
			
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				a[i]=sc.nextInt();
			}
			
			java.util.Arrays.sort(a);
			
			if(n%2==0)
			{
				for(i=0;i<n/2;i++)
			    {
				    System.out.print(a[n-i-1]+" "+a[i]+" ");
			    }
			}
			
			else
			{
				for(i=0;i<=n/2;i++)
			    {
					if(i==n/2)
					{
						System.out.print(a[i]+" ");
					}
					
				    else System.out.print(a[n-i-1]+" "+a[i]+" ");
			    }
			}
			
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}
